epic.name: QUANTUM FUSION CORE
epic.description: Cutting-edge technology that dramatically enhances D.Va's fusion cannons with devastating damage.

epic.name: HYPER MATRIX PROJECTOR
epic.description: Revolutionary defense matrix technology that dramatically increases coverage area and absorption capacity.

epic.name: EXPERIMENTAL MEKA REACTOR
epic.description: Cutting-edge power system that dramatically improves MEKA durability and recovery systems.

powers.title: FOCUSED FUSION
powers.description: [Fusion Cannon]'s spread is reduced by 66% and damage falloff range is 20m farther.

powers.title: LEGENDARY LOADOUT
powers.description: [Micro Missiles] are replaced with 6 Heavy Rockets, which deal 350% more explosive damage and have 100% increased radius.

powers.title: COUNTERMEASURES
powers.description: When you mitigate 150 damage with [Defense Matrix], automatically fire 2 [Micro Missiles].

powers.title: FACETANKING
powers.description: [Defense Matrix] heals you for 30% of the damage it blocks.

powers.title: ULTRAWIDE MATRIX
powers.description: Increase the size of [Defense Matrix] by 50% and its duration by 20%.

powers.title: IGNITION BURST
powers.description: [Boosters] leave a trail of lava that deals 30 damage every 1s.

powers.title: MEKA PUNCH
powers.description: While using [Boosters], [Quick Melee] deals 75% more damage. MEKA Punch eliminations reset the cooldown of [Boosters].

powers.title: STAT BOOST
powers.description: During the first 2s of [Boosters], [Defense Matrix] recovers 100% faster.

powers.title: TOKKI SLAM
powers.description: During [Boosters], use crouch to slam the ground, dealing damage equal to 20% of your max Armor and knocking up enemies hit.

powers.title: PARTY PROTECTOR
powers.description: When you use [Self-Destruct], allies within [Self-Destruct] radius gain 250 Overhealth for 8s.
